snippet: George Villanueva faces up to 30 years in prison for the death of Alain Schaberger, who fell off a stoop during a struggle involving Mr. Villanueva.
abstract: Jury convicts George Villanueva of manslaughter in the the death of New York City Police Officer Alain Schaberger, who fell off a stoop during a struggle in Brooklyn; Villanueva faces up to 30 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: George Villanueva faces up to 30 years in prison for the death of Alain Schaberger, who fell off a stoop during a struggle involving Mr. Villanueva.

headline.seo: Man Convicted of Manslaughter in Pushing Death of Officer
headline.main: Man Accused of Pushing Officer to His Death in Brooklyn Is Convicted
headline.print_headline: Jury Convicts Man Accused Of Killing Officer With a Push
